data.actual_result: It's filled with the half typed out message, (in this example, `Hello! My nam`)
data.short_description: Following a specific series of steps will cause an old and half-typed text to appear in the textbox
data.steps_to_repro: - Let's imagine you want to send the following message : `Hello! My name is Dabbit.` - Choose a channel and start to type the message: `Hello! My nam` (cut here) - Let's consider you need to search for a message immediately, it cannot wait for you to finish typing the messqge. Tap the magnifying glass and search for anything - In the search results, pick any message and jump to it - Go back to the channel you were typing the message in - Finish typing your message and send it - Now, minimize Discord using the Home button of your phone - Re-open Discord using the shortcut icon on your homescreen (NOT VIA MULTI-TASKING) - Look at the textfield
